languages.text: "Без сомнения, столь щедрый дар Простору принес бы Вашей Светлости великую славу, но платой за это будет обращение Фолстоуна обратно в пустыню и утрата престижа, который дает обладание столь ценной реликвией".

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."
languages.original_text: "Без сомнения, столь щедрый дар Простору принес бы Вашей Светлости великую славу, но платой за это будет обращение Фолстоуна обратно в пустыню и утрата престижа, который дает обладание столь ценной реликвией".

traits.locale_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the cost would be turning Foulstone back into a wasteland and losing the prestige that comes with having such a valuable relic in your keeping."

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the cost would be turning Foulstone back into a wasteland and losing the prestige that comes with having such a valuable relic in your keeping."

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

"It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

languages.text: “不用多说，向科罗努斯扩区赠送这样慷慨的礼物可以为您带来巨大的声誉，但代价同样高昂。荒寂岩地会再次变回一片荒地，而你也将失去掌控珍贵圣物所带来的声望。”
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

traits.locale_text: “不用多说，向科罗努斯扩区赠送这样慷慨的礼物可以为您带来巨大的声誉，但代价同样高昂。荒寂岩地会再次变回一片荒地，而你也将失去掌控珍贵圣物所带来的声望。”

languages.text: «Ni que decir tiene que un regalo tan generoso a la Extensión de Koronus podría reportaros un gran renombre, pero a un alto coste. Rocainmunda volvería a convertirse en un páramo y perderíais el prestigio que conlleva tener a cargo una reliquia tan valiosa».
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

traits.locale_text: «Ni que decir tiene que un regalo tan generoso a la Extensión de Koronus podría reportaros un gran renombre, pero a un alto coste. Rocainmunda volvería a convertirse en un páramo y perderíais el prestigio que conlleva tener a cargo una reliquia tan valiosa».

languages.text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスへのこのような気前のいい贈り物が、陛下に大きな名声をもたらすことは言うまでもないが、その代償は大きい。ファウルストーンは荒れ地に戻り、陛下自身もそのような貴重な遺物の管理に付随する威信を失うことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

traits.locale_text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスへのこのような気前のいい贈り物が、陛下に大きな名声をもたらすことは言うまでもないが、その代償は大きい。ファウルストーンは荒れ地に戻り、陛下自身もそのような貴重な遺物の管理に付随する威信を失うことになるだろう」

languages.text: « Il va sans dire qu'un don d'une telle générosité fait aux Étendues de Koronus apportera une grande renommée à Votre Seigneurie, mais à quel prix ? Rochepeste redeviendra un terrain vague, et vous perdrez le prestige inhérent à la garde d'une relique aussi précieuse. »
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

traits.locale_text: « Il va sans dire qu'un don d'une telle générosité fait aux Étendues de Koronus apportera une grande renommée à Votre Seigneurie, mais à quel prix ? Rochepeste redeviendra un terrain vague, et vous perdrez le prestige inhérent à la garde d'une relique aussi précieuse. »

languages.text: "Es versteht sich von selbst, dass ein solch großzügiges Geschenk an die Koronus-Ausdehnung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} großen Ruhm einbringen könnte, allerdings zu einem hohen Preis. Foulstone würde sich wieder in ein Ödland verwandeln, und Ihr würdet das Ansehen verlieren, das der Besitz einer solch wertvollen Reliquie mit sich bringt."
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."

traits.locale_text: "Es versteht sich von selbst, dass ein solch großzügiges Geschenk an die Koronus-Ausdehnung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} großen Ruhm einbringen könnte, allerdings zu einem hohen Preis. Foulstone würde sich wieder in ein Ödland verwandeln, und Ihr würdet das Ansehen verlieren, das der Besitz einer solch wertvollen Reliquie mit sich bringt."

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği'ne böylesine cömert bir hediye bahşetmenin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine muazzam bir nam sağlamasına rağmen ağır bir bedeli olacağını söylemeye gerek yoktur. Menfurtaş, yeniden çorak bir dünyaya dönebilir ve böylesine kıymetli bir yadigâra sahip olmanın sağladığı prestiji kaybedebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "It goes without saying that such a generous gift to the Koronus Expanse could bring great renown to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but at a heavy cost. Foulstone would turn back into a wasteland and you would lose the prestige that comes with having charge over such a valuable relic."
